title: Visual Emphasis Simulation Education for Improving Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Conducting interactive simulations in VR environments, providing real-time feedback via individual devices

learning_goals: Learners can identify core elements with 90% accuracy using callouts during information searches in VR simulation environments
Learners can explain at least three credibility judgment criteria when evaluating digital resources
Learners can critically verify information sources with over 80% accuracy in simulation tasks
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
